channel.title: Project MightyReloaded Progress
channel.description:
[size=50pt]Project MightyReloaded![/size]
[b]Note:[/b] [i]I was creating a Server from Winterlove/BlakeScape Called RuneVirtual. But Since ive failed with making combat. Ive started with Project Quest RPM and forgot why i shouldnt make MightyReloaded. Ive Started making Quest RPM. After Some days i changed the name to MightyReloaded. and this will be my 1 of my lastest Server i will create.[/i]
[b]Another Note:[/b] [i]Wanna Help me? and do you have some Java skills? Then Send me a pm and i will think about it.[/i]
[b]Updated:[/b] Server Base: Project 16 V6 Client.java : 460KB Fully Working Altar Praying (For Prayer Points) Defender now have Requirements: Bronze Defender:1 Attack, 1 Defence Iron Defender:1 Attack, 1 Defence Steel Defender:5 Attack, 5 Defence Black Defender:10 Attack, 10 Defence Mithril Defender:20 Attack, 20 Defence Adamant Defender:30 Attack, 30 Defence Runite Defender:40 Attack, 49 Defence Based In Misc Island Own Made Client Not Finished. Only started Some new Sideicons. Soon new gameframe, Original Background: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/3205/backgroundgd6.jpg[/img][/URL] Slayer ( With random Task, Soon random Amounts! ) And Working Slayer handler. Picture of Slayer: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img522.imageshack.us/img522/6691/slaysnt3.jpg[/img][/URL] [b]Handlers:[/b] [i]Slayer handler Weapon Handler Un-Working Tzhaar Game Handler. Fletching Handler (Not Finished) Range Handler(Finished) Requirements Handler(Finished) Special Attack Handler (Finished) Graphics Handler(Finished)[/i]
Special Attacks: Full Dds Special Attack(With Double hits) [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/2719/specattackgm4.jpg[/img][/URL] Picture of Dds: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/1912/specattack2kh9.jpg[/img][/URL] [b]Are There another Working Special Attacks?[/b] [i]Yes, There are almost all Special Attacks. Includes: Dragon Long Dragon Scim Dragon Halberd Dragon Mace Dragon Dagger S Abyssal Whip Magic Bow.(Not Fully)
[b]Ranged:[/b] [i]All Arrows Are Working Includes All bows.[/i] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/89/rangedbowssa7.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]My Own GodWars[/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/9494/bandosstartmg3.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/5776/bandoskinggn5.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]Dark Bow:(SpecialAttack)[/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/6200/dbowew8.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]More Coming Soon![/b]
~[b]Bone Thugs Productions[/b]

item.title: Project MightyReloaded Progress
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

[size=50pt]Project MightyReloaded![/size]

Note:
I was creating a Server from Winterlove/BlakeScape Called RuneVirtual. But Since ive failed with making
combat. Ive started with Project Quest RPM and forgot why i shouldnt make MightyReloaded.
Ive Started making Quest RPM. After Some days i changed the name to MightyReloaded. and this will be my
1 of my lastest Server i will create.

Another Note:
Wanna Help me? and do you have some Java skills?
Then Send me a pm and i will think about it.

Updated:
Server Base: Project 16 V6
Client.java : 460KB
Fully Working Altar Praying (For Prayer Points)
Defender now have Requirements:
Bronze Defender:1 Attack, 1 Defence
Iron Defender:1 Attack, 1 Defence
Steel Defender:5 Attack, 5 Defence
Black Defender:10 Attack, 10 Defence
Mithril Defender:20 Attack, 20 Defence
Adamant Defender:30 Attack, 30 Defence
Runite Defender:40 Attack, 49 Defence
Based In Misc Island
Own Made Client Not Finished. Only started Some new Sideicons. Soon new gameframe,
Original Background:

Slayer ( With random Task, Soon random Amounts! )
And Working Slayer handler.
Picture of Slayer:

Handlers:
Slayer handler
Weapon Handler
Un-Working Tzhaar Game Handler.
Fletching Handler (Not Finished)
Range Handler(Finished)
Requirements Handler(Finished)
Special Attack Handler (Finished)
Graphics Handler(Finished)

Special Attacks:
Full Dds Special Attack(With Double hits)

Picture of Dds:

Are There another Working Special Attacks?
[i]Yes, There are almost all Special Attacks. Includes:
Dragon Long
Dragon Scim
Dragon Halberd
Dragon Mace
Dragon Dagger S
Abyssal Whip
Magic Bow.(Not Fully)

Ranged:
All Arrows Are Working Includes All bows.

My Own GodWars

Dark Bow:(SpecialAttack)

More Coming Soon!

~Bone Thugs Productions
